short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Chrome Extension designed to seamlessly connect your ESPN leagues to your sliders.ai account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool is designed to seamlessly connect your fantasy leagues to Siders.ai, your personalized fantasy sports reporter.

This extension locates and extracts ESPN cookies required to authenticate your private leagues, eliminating the need for complex manual processes. Once authenticated, you can easily connect your leagues to www.siders.ai, creating an intuitive and enjoyable fantasy sports experience.
